description: A classmate of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang], Malcolm Wideborn was the top student of the Class of 787. He was a textbook tactician, and inflexible in his ways. This made him easy prey for opponents with unconventional and fluid tactics, such as Yang in a classroom simulation or Reinhard at the Sixth Battle of Iserlohn -- the latter engagement costing Wideborn his life.
name: Malcolm Wideborn
